items.title: actionscript transparent textinput background
items.body:
after hours of search I successfully set my font color to yellow, but I still can`t figure out how to make my background of textinput transparent :( (I dragged it out of the component window) What is wrong with my code?

var tf:TextFormat = new TextFormat();
tf.size = 10;
tf.color = 0xFFF000;
nameField.setStyle("textFormat", tf);

nameField.alpha = 0;
